item.title: NASA, Blue Origin Invite Media to Attend Mars Mission Launch - NASA
item.description: NASA and Blue Origin are reopening media accreditation for the launch of the agency’s ESCAPADE (Escape and Plasma Acceleration and Dynamics Explorers)

item.title: NASA, International Partners Deepen Commitment to Artemis Accords - NASA
item.description: NASA, along with leaders from global space agencies and government representatives worldwide, convened on Monday to further the implementation of the Artemis

item.title: 2025 News Releases - NASA
item.description: Sign up to receive NASA news releases and other information.

item.title: Crew Works Advanced Science Hardware and Conducts Lab Inspections - NASA
item.description: Space science hardware once again topped the schedule for the Expedition 73 crew aboard the International Space Station on Tuesday. Life support and electronics maintenance to keep the orbital outpost in tip-top shape filled the rest of the day for the space lab residents.

item.title: Crew Begins Week Configuring Advanced Physics, Space Tech Demo Hardware - NASA
item.description: Science hardware was the focus on Monday as the Expedition 73 crew configured foam and material physics research gear and installed a space technology demonstration. Meanwhile, blood circulation studies and cargo operations rounded out the day aboard the International Space Station.

item.title: Submit a Media Inquiry | Blue Origin
item.description: If you’re a member of the press, please contact us at media@blueorigin.com with your inquiry and deadline.

item.title: Gallery | Blue Origin
item.description: Images available for download. Please credit Blue Origin.

item.title: New Shepard’s Crewed NS-36 Mission Targets Liftoff on October 8 | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin announced its next New Shepard crewed flight, NS-36, will lift off from Launch Site One in West Texas on Wednesday, October 8. The crew includes: Jeff Elgin, Danna Karagussova, Dr. Clint Kelly III, Aaron Newman, Vitalii Ostrovsky, and an undisclosed sixth crew member.

item.title: Blue Origin and Luxembourg Partner on Oasis-1 Mission to Map Lunar Resources | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin today announced Project Oasis, a multi-phase initiative to identify key lunar resources from orbit, assess them on the ground, and harness them in situ.

item.title: Florida Investment Matches Our Ambitious Growth Plans | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin employs nearly 4,000 people in Brevard County and has invested over $2.3 billion with 500 suppliers in Florida, generating significant economic growth and employment in the region.

item.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
item.description: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

item.description: Throughout August, the Terran R program continued to make measurable progress toward first launch, delivering on critical program milestones.
